name: Monster Gacha 怪兽扭蛋
description:
A simple, relaxing casual gacha game.

You'll get 10 stamina points every day, which you can use to play mini-games to earn coins. Then, use those coins to gacha and expand your collection.

Made at the AI Game Jam Shenzhen site, with 90% of the art assets produced by AI and 10% of the code produced by chatGPT (translated by chatGPT)

一个简单放松的休闲扭蛋游戏。

你每天会获得10个体力，你可以用体力去玩小游戏来挣取金币，然后使用金币来扭蛋扩展你的收藏。

制作于 AI Game Jam 深圳站点，90% 美术资源由AI产出，10%代码由chatGPT产出。
